General Settings:Manufacturer Name

Short name: Manf Name

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: FireWire Instr, PXI Instr, PXI Backplane, USB Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME RBD Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr, USB Raw

Returns the name of the manufacturer that created the device.

Noteï¿½ Use the value of this property for display purposes only and not for programmatic decisions. The value can change between VISA implementations and/or revisions.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read Only
